title: Evolutionary dynamics of value co-creation within the industry-university-research network: A multi-agent game perspective
description: This paper investigates the evolutionary dynamics of value co-creation and defines the roles of multiple agents within the industry-university-research (IUR) network. A distinctive evolutionary game model from a multi-agent perspective is proposed to capture …
